projects.name: SmartHire: Resume Analyzer and Job Skill Matcher
projects.description: Developed the frontend of a resume parsing platform using React. Integrated Google Gemini API for advanced resume parsing and structured data extraction. Implemented dynamic graphical representations and intuitive UI for improved user experience.

projects.name: Intelligent Insurance Policy QA System
projects.description: Built an LLM-powered QA system during Bajaj-Finserv hackathon HackRx 6. Integrated Google Gemini API and MongoDB for contextual QA.

extracurricular.title: Event Management Head
extracurricular.description: Spearheaded planning and logistics for flagship entrepreneurial fests MAGNATE. Coordinated with sponsors.
